text: A few days ago, I stayed indoors due to the extreme cold. Tonight, after class, I took the bus home. After getting off, I was listening to "到處留情" through my headphones, reaching that incredibly beautiful violin part while walking from the bus stop to my apartment. Snowflakes were drifting in the air, and the surrounding lights were dim. A girl walked past me from the opposite direction, head down and wrapped tightly in her down jacket. Suddenly, a feeling of emotional nostalgia welled up inside me. But there's no one I want to share this with anymore, no one I can share this with anymore.

>The era of chaos and turmoil has begun.

>群魔乱舞的时代开始了。

A life goal of mine is to visit the Galápagos Islands to see penguins—those adorable creatures that drift from Antarctica along the Peruvian Current to Ecuador. I want to disconnect from my phone and the internet, lie on a serene beach, sit on a boat above crystal-clear waters, and journey through tropical jungles.


人生的阶段性目标是去加拉帕戈斯群岛看企鹅，去看秘鲁寒流下从南极洲漂流到厄尔瓜多的小可爱们，去那里丢掉手机和网络，躺在安安静静的海滩上，坐在透明海水之上的船只漂过热带丛林

I'm going to tell people that I majored in Digital Media Technology for my bachelor's degree - if I say it enough times, it'll become true. Besides, I'm not changing the university, I'm just changing it to a major I like ʕ•̫͡•ʔ
Tiktok ban is really a bad news for Chinese who lives in America seeking for a job 😔
I burned my roommate's cutting board QAQ
I decided to call myself "rusty rain" in the future, coming from "rusty brain" originally 😤😭
I have two South America roommates, both of them are energetic and polite and provide me high quality emotion value 😽😽
That really gives me kind of feeling of safety, thanks!

In the US, the assignment of computer science is so difficult. I feel that the one-week coding project could be one big course project in China (𖦹‎.𖦹‎)

Thanks to AI in this era, I can't believe how people survive in the past years with so big workload while without ChatGPT

I guess that the heating of my apartment is under some kind of centralized system, the total amount is limited. Because in the day, I always feel so warm that I turn it off, but near the night -- I guess most residents come home, I feel it's not powerful as in the day.

https://www.globaltimes.cn/page/202501/1326802.shtml

In my RED timeline, the posts become half English and half Chinese because of this, which is very funny.
I renamed my channel's name to "memo in the garbage time of history", which perfectly reflects my mind in 2025

On the last day of 2024, I sit in my apartment in Chicago, reflecting on my future and the main goals for the next two years. I've been thinking about key themes like Computer Graphics, Technical Artistry, Digital Media, and Creative Tools. Broadly, I want to pursue a field that blends technology and art to make a meaningful impact on people's daily lives.

I understand that reaching my goals will require a significant commitment of time and energy to mastering math, research, coding, and debugging. But if this is the field I am passionate about dedicating my life to, why not start now? If I don't try, I'll regret and will try it one day eventually. If I try, even if I fail, at least I’ll know I gave it my all.

This is the perfect age to explore, to discover what truly matters to me. As I’ve decided, for the next two years—and beyond—let’s just do it.
